alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lea, western Andrews, southwestern Gaines and north central Winkler Counties through 345 PM CDT/245 PM MDT/... At 256 PM CDT/156 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jal Airport, or near Jal, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eunice, Jal, Jal Airport, Bennett and Frankel City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT/900 PM MDT/ for southeastern New Mexico...and western Texas.
